actions.text: Amendment SA 4907 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 235.

Amendment SA 4907 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S9075-9082 ; text: CR 9075) To enhance intelligence community efforts to bring Osama bin Laden and other key leaders of al Qaeda to the justice they deserve.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4907 proposed by Senator Conrad.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4907 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 235.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4907 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 235.

purpose: To enhance intelligence community efforts to bring Osama bin Laden and other key leaders of al Qaeda to the justice they deserve.
